request-to-update-bank-details: CEOs and Heads of Finance can
submit-a-request: submit a request to update local authority’s bank details.
request-bank-details-update: Update your local bank authority bank details
request-to: Update your local bank authority bank details
we-need-your: We need your local authority's latest bank details to make sure pEPR payments are sent to the correct account.
submit-your: Submit your updated bank details securely using the online form

you-will-receive: You will receive an email once your updated bank details are verified and approved
must-be-between: Must be between 6 and 8 digits long
we-will-verify: We will verify the information with your local authority’s authorised officer.
you-will-receive-a-confirmation: You will receive a confirmation email once the update is approved.
sortCodePattern: Enter a valid sort code like 309430
sortCodeLength: Sort code must be 6 digits long
accountNumberDigits: Enter a valid account number like 12345678
accountNumberMin: Account number must be at least 6 digits long
accountNumberMax: Account number must be no more than 8 digits long
we-use-essential-cookies: We use some essential cookies to make this service work.
what-are-cookies: Cookies are small files saved on your phone, tablet or computer when you visit a website.
why-use-cookies: We use cookies to make this site work and collect information about how you use our service.
what-essential-cookies-do: Essential cookies keep your information secure while you use this service. We do not need to ask permission to use them.
name: Name
session-cookie-use: Used to identify and persist a unique session for each user/browser
user-session-cookie-use: Used to keep you signed in
cookie_preferences_set_use: Lets us know that you've saved your cookie consent settings
locale-cookie-use: Used to set your language preference
csrf-token: Cross Site Request Forgery (CSRF) token storage
no-payment-docs: You have no payment documents to view
